website_summaries.verdict: A unique and affordable set that offers a fun combination of colors, a base plate, and a booklet filled with creative ideas to get kids started.
pros: Comes with a generous number of pieces in different hues: 300 basic colored pieces plus 100 neon pieces
Base plate provides a solid foundation for 3D creations
Booklet with step by step  instructions makes it easy for beginners to create masterpieces
cons: Pieces are unsafe for kids under the age of 3 to use without supervision

customer_reviews.title: These are very small, PlusPlus Big is what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We saw PlusPlus blocks about a year ago at a retail store. We intended to give these to our 2 year old as a birthday gift since he enjoyed playing with them so much at the store. We didn't know the blocks come in different sizes. These were very small and difficult for our 2 year old to handle. Luckily we have 5 year old that was more than willing to keep them. What we thought we were getting is called "PlusPlus Big". Hopefully this helps someone else from mistakingly ordering the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Eli S.

customer_reviews.title: Glow in the dark works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the regular colored ones for my son and he really loved them so I decided to get this glow in the dark set to add. He loved these too. They really do glow in the dark. We've found that shining a flashlight directly on them for a few seconds really makes them light up.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids of all ages
customer_reviews.text: With school starting very soon, lots of families are still doing homeschooling or remote learning. This is a great arts and crafts inspired toy for kids of all ages. Imagine little puzzle type pieces you can connect together to create bracelets, rings, necklaces and so much more. This toy is a great way to inspire imagination, hone hand-eye coordination and spark creativity. It really reminds me of the friendship bracelet trend I was into as a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hale

customer_reviews.title: Fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 yr old granddaughter after my 8 yr old grandson told me how much he liked them. While she was a bit frustrated trying to create some of the 3 dimensional figures, she has been having so much fun making one and 2 dimensional figures and shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Bodman

customer_reviews.title: Great building toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old and his friend played with this set for hours together. They created so many cool things from the book that was provided and then on their own. It kept their attention longer than I expected and he's pulled it out several times after. I'm really glad I bought these and will likely buy another set for Christmas to add to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun and challenging
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old kept talking about the plus plus toy at school and how much he liked to play with it, so we decided to get him a set for home. They are super cool! Dad loves playing with them as much as the little guy does. They are unlike another type of block. They are versatile but require logic and problem solving to build with.
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Fun product to keep the kids busy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to give her something to do when her friends come over and to get her off playing video games all day. She had a blast with her friend making fun jewelry ad coming up with different builds. With the holidays coming up, this is a great product for gift giving as well!! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: njkaren

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We borrowed these for a road trip and I immediately ordered our own when we got home. This set is big enough for my 8 and 3 year old to share. Great for fine motor skills, creative play. I strongly prefer them over legos. They travel easily, store small and don't hurt to step on
customer_reviews.author: Liz Haynes

customer_reviews.title: A Fan Favorite
customer_reviews.text: We originally purchased these for my 7 year old son this past summer - he plays with them all the time! Every kiddo that comes over, falls in love with them too, so we have purchased SEVERAL additional sets for gifts since then. Such a great way to encourage open play and creativity!
customer_reviews.author: UAJessie

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We pack these for the airport, dinner parties, anywhere that it’s nice to have something to fidget with that cleans up quickly and doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Raven johnson

customer_reviews.title: glow in the dark
customer_reviews.text: So glow in the dark supposed to be glow but I would call it anything but glow. In an absolute darkness we can hardly see them....just requested a return. I really want to avoid the return in this difficult situation I don't wanna go all the way to Kohls or even UPS but my little one was expecting glowing plus plus he is really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arshorsky

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to Legos
customer_reviews.text: Pieces are easy to work with. Instruction booklet shows design that can be copied. However the box lacks all the colors needed to make the shapes. For example, there aren’t enough orange pieces to make the clown fish.
customer_reviews.author: IL Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, very vibrant.
customer_reviews.text: This is great, for hours (and I do mean hours) of entertainment for my 5 year old and husband who sit together building different things to impress each other. I keep them in a ziplock bag when all done. Easier to store than legos and not nearly as painful if you step on them!
customer_reviews.author: Aurel Crisan

customer_reviews.title: I felt like a hero giving this gift to a five year old boy.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this gift to my great nephew on his 5th birthday and he played with it during my whole visit. He was very proud of his creations.
customer_reviews.author: Word of Mouth

customer_reviews.title: Our box did not come with the guide book
customer_reviews.text: We are new to plus-plus. I ordered this box for my 5 year old daughter. Although it says it contains a guide book, it wasn't included. The set I bought for my son (basic colors with neon colors) did contain the guide book. The kids seem to enjoy the plus-plus construction sets but I wish the packers at plus-plus had a better QC system.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Gum

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter was able to release her imagination!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter was eager to begin building with this new idea!!! She loved how many different items she could build and let her imagination go wild. She had variety of colors and could build upon ideas already shared in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my nephew and he absolutely loves it. The neon colors are fun and the glow in the dark pieces are his favorite. The guide book is great for instructions on how to build with the pieces. It’s a great toy for letting the imagination come to life.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: 8 year old enjoys creative building
customer_reviews.text: Great gift! 8 year old son loves building these. He was beginning to tire of Legos, and now this is something completely different for him to work on! Excited to buy more add-on tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Oloffson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing imagination toy.
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these. He very seldom can sit down and build anything. But since he got these he has spent at least 1-2 hours everyday building things with these.
customer_reviews.author: justina anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome building toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for a birthday gift and my nephew absolutely loves it! I've seen videos of him putting together different figures and having them "play" sports. So cute! This set comes with instructions and kids can also use their imaginations - great for having them learn building skills while also a fun screen-free activity!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my toddler interested for days on end!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. It’s simple, but fun and somewhat addicting to play with! Keeps toddlers entertained for days on end, which is no easy feat. Also keeps the adults in the house out of trouble. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Plant Grower

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set for creative minds!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this set. He is 6 and it is perfect for him. It keeps him busy for an hour easily and often longer. I wish this set had been around when his daddy was a little boy.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!!! We bought this for my daughter to take when she babysits. The girls loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Fun For All Ages!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 13 year old nephew. He has always loved building and creating new things so this was a great new addition to his collection. He LOVED it! I would say this is fun for all ages. :)
customer_reviews.author: cpetersen529

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for busy minds
customer_reviews.text: My 2 and 5 year old love this. We travel with it in a pencil case and they are small but it doesn't matter if you lose a couple here and there.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER H

customer_reviews.title: Great for builders of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son loves these things...his 9 year old brother gets in on the action, too! This set has so many colors, they started making football helmets of teams they liked in the corresponding colors

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy. My boys love them. They play with them for hours. Recently we’ve been making letters and numbers with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alie Butterfield

customer_reviews.title: A good toy for ages 5-95!
customer_reviews.text: Open ended, good quality manipulative toy exactly what I wanted to give my grandchild.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Mee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these - hes 8. Great motor - creativity - fine skills - engineering- “toy”.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Pahukoa

customer_reviews.title: Great for any age!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a creative toy, my kids love creating and building sports figures! It keeps them busy for quite some time, which I love!
customer_reviews.author: abramsonclan

customer_reviews.title: Kids  and older even adults enjoys playing with this tot
customer_reviews.text: The grandkids had a lot of fun playing with this toy. They call it puzzles since they are ages 3 ylo, 5ylo, & 6 ylo
customer_reviews.author: Bechai

customer_reviews.title: Better than Legos
customer_reviews.text: We just love these things. My daughter got and sample of them for a gift - a unicorn. Once we figured out how to use them I had to order more. They're so much fun and you can be so much more creative.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids of all ages. Vibrant colors. Interlocking pieces that you can build all kinds of things. A nice alternative for LEGO’s
customer_reviews.author: Amy Burke

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Big opportunity for creativity with these tiny little pieces! My 7 year old daughter LOVES them! The instructions are relatively easy to follow too when you're building one of the specific shapes but also some more challenging patterns as well!

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Brought out a lot of creativity in my already creative grandson
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! My son loves them, he loves Legos, but these are so much more versatile and leaves so much to the imagination. This is honestly the one toy he will not complain about no TV and happily play for hours with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea For Niece/Nephew!
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this Plus-Plus set for my nephew's 10th birthday and he actually loved it and he is usually not big on toys. And since everything is compatible I think I've found my go-to gift haha. Definitely recommended for any kids in your life :)
customer_reviews.author: XR

customer_reviews.title: Plus+
customer_reviews.text: Regretted not getting these at a state park. Lucky to have found them on amazon when I was endlessly searching for a gift for the kids. Only con is their size but the older kids had no issues.

customer_reviews.title: They're very versatile and easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old absolutely loves these! I'm planning on getting my nephew some for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves to build with these blocks and they are really fun!

customer_reviews.text: My kids love this set. It helps them use their imagination easy to build with.

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this wonder learning tool from my son’s kindergarten teacher last year so I was familiar with it. He still loves it. NOTE: size of baseplate & option to buy additional ones. We LOVE the neon colors!

customer_reviews.text: These are great! Easy to take on the go to keep kids busy! They offer open ended creativity! I gave them to my kindergarten students for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my nephew. He is 3.5 and this is a great for quiet play. You can add in complexity by using the guides provided.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Soooo much fun for kids and adults! I think I played with it more than the little ones I bought it for! So many options on how/what to build!

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 10 month old grandson, my daughter days he's thrilled!

customer_reviews.title: Great toy & perfect variety!
customer_reviews.text: Just received our order & we love it! The variety pack is great as it includes both the regular & neon colors as well as the green plate to use for construction!

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 year old son. He enjoys playing with them. I would not recommend these for children younger than four as they are very small pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent creative toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hours of fun for both my ten year old and four year old. Great alternative to Lego sets and easier to transport. And cheaper!

customer_reviews.title: The next best thing in toys!
customer_reviews.text: Introduced to these at my local children's museum and had to buy more after my son used all 500 pieces we bought at the museum.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let the age of the kids on the package deter you from buying these for your older kids. We bought different sets of these as Easter gifts for our 16, 13, 10, & 8 year olds. Loved by all!!!

customer_reviews.title: a fun and unique building toy
customer_reviews.text: these are so much fun! my 6 year old could spend hours playing with them just as i or her dad also could!

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!
customer_reviews.text: We ran into this product at a hockey tournament and I knew we just had to have them! Our 6 yr old loves to build with these!

customer_reviews.title: Fun, fun, fun!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for older kids, keeps my 9 year old granddaughter busy for hours.

customer_reviews.title: these are great
customer_reviews.text: my boys, 4 and 6 love these constructable blocks. I have found them very useful at restaurants especially.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Don't trust the low ratings of this movie by other reviewers; it is clearly better than many movies Hollywood produces.
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand why this movie was so poorly rated by others. Perhaps they did not watch much more than the opening credits? What I truly enjoyed about this movie was that it is a very relevant think piece regarding the ethics of advancing technology. I won't give a spoiler. Its better than other people are currently rating it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good building set for kids with imagination
customer_reviews.text: So these little plus plus units are real nice. If you don’t know what they are they resemble legos in the fact that you can build stuff with them. They look like little puzzle pieces and you can connect them together to make pretty much whatever you can think or dream of. If your child likes to build stuff with LEGO’s, then I think her or she will like to play with these plus plus blocks. These do require good fine motor skills as they are a little smaller like legos. I would say the age range for these would be 5 years old and up. And have a kid with a active imagination that loves to build.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. My child likes it,she is 3 years old
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Neat Toy and Gift
customer_reviews.text: Super fun toy for littles, endless possibilities and a fun neat gift instead of the usual building bricks.

customer_reviews.title: Great for ny 5 year old's birthday!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Plus Plus and this set doesn't disappoint!

product_meta.title: Plus-Plus - Learn to Build Basic Color Mix, 400 Piece - Construction Building STEM | STEAM Toy, Interlocking Mini Puzzle Blocks for Kids
feature_bullets: SIMPLE DESIGN - FUELS CREATIVITY: One shape, endless possibility! Every brick easily connects to the next. Create colorful flat mosaics or work in 3-D to make more intricate builds. Mix and match any Plus-Plus set to bring more ideas to life!

STEM | STEAM Toy: Plus-Plus empowers children with free explorative play as they encourage fine motor skills, logic, creativity and imagination all without the use of screens. Part engineering, part art, with a bit of math and a whole lot of FUN!

PERFECT FOR ON-THE-GO: Design and build your creations any way you want, wherever you want! Great for every adventure – car rides, restaurants, a friend’s house, or in your own living room. Stay entertained for hours!

BUILDING SET INCLUDES: This Learn to Build playset includes a mixture of styles and tools to create incredible 3-D pieces. In this set you can find 300 Basic pieces, 100 Neon pieces, a Baseplate, and Step-by-Step Idea Guide book to spark creativity!
SUGGESTED FOR AGES 5-12: Each Plus-Plus piece measures 3/4" x 1/2". Appeals to a broad range of ages! Made from high quality BPA-free and phthalate-free plastic. Made in Denmark.
